posts.subject: remember
posts.body:
unless you change your id everytime, everything you post is saved on every user's computer.
your entire post history is public, available for anyone to view, so make sure not to post any identifying information and maybe change your zeronet id from time to time.

im not sure about what the easiest way is, but im pretty sure deleting the data directory should reset everything, though you will have to re-sync every site all over.
im still looking into this.
